headline: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) Declares US$1.75 Dividend on Series B Preferred Stock and US$0.26 on Common Stock
summary: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) recently announced dividends on its preferred and common stock, affirming its financial stability and shareholder commitment. Over the last week, Bank of America shares rose 4%, mirroring the broader market's upward trend amid positive earnings reports and anticipations regarding tariff news. The company’s decision to redeem its senior notes may have added weight to its price increase, reflecting proactive debt management. As major indices like the S&P 500 and...

headline: Best Travel Credit Card: How to choose
summary: Credit-card issuers like Chase (JPM), American Express (AXP), Capital One (COF), Wells Fargo (WFC), Bank of America (BAC), and Citibank (C) offer general travel rewards credit cards. United Airlines (UAL), Delta Air Lines (DAL), Marriott (MAR), Hilton (HLT), and Hyatt (H) offer their own credit cards, too. Yahoo Finance Senior Credit Card Reporter Ben Walker breaks down how to choose the right card for you.
